ygData.subject: (OT) Language Filter
ygData.msgSnippet: Is it just me, or has there been a new language filter implemented in the last few months?  I ve noticed it off an on since I got back - wasn t sure what I was
ygData.messageBody:
Is it just me, or has there been a new language filter implemented in the
last few months? I've noticed it off an on since I got back - wasn't sure
what I was seeing until I really started watching. Seems like most of
George Carlin's "10 words" are now "censored" by being converted to
"garbage" as though they were speaking a different language.

Personally, I find it hilarious, and very in character - I just assume
they're cursing in a language I don't understand. But I wonder - if you
spam someone with cursing long enough will their skill eventually improve?

"You language skills have increased. (Sailor-talk - 12)"


Talies the Wanderer

"Vragnq server! I just got booted off the trheolw boat again!"
